issues.description: The Farm class in the template defines a private no-argument constructor, but the exercise requires a public no-arg constructor so that students can instantiate Farm (e.g., `new Farm()`). The private constructor blocks instantiation and contradicts both the problem instructions and the solution.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the Farm constructor from private to public (`public Farm() { ... }`) so that students can instantiate the class as intended.

issues.description: The template’s singFarmSongVerse method signature is declared without an Animal parameter, but the UML and reference solution require `singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)`. Without the parameter, students cannot implement the per-animal verse logic.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the signature to `private void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)` so it matches the UML and allows passing each animal into the verse method.
